annetQuote: I'm passionate about sports in general, and I always like to discover new sports that I haven't done before. That plus traveling is the perfect combination.

rogerQuote: I've visited a few countries to explore mountain trails, either hiking, climbing peaks, running, or with mountain bike. It usually takes me weeks until I find interesting trip options. Where was depor.travel all this time?
